entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Question] What is the intended way that namespaces in platform-specific folder work? #13972
  • IsEnabled is unable to update visual appearance #13971
  • Set Focus on custom control #13969
  • Color.Equals() returns true for Colors with small difference #13968
  • Border Left and Right Margins Dont work on iOS, works well on Android #13965
    Backlog
  • RadioButton TextColor Doesnt work on iOS it is always black, works well on Android #13964
    Backlog
  • AmbiguousMatchException when BindableProperty is hidden in a derived class and is then set in XAML #13962
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor: Referencing RCL to MAUI Blazor project triggers error on Android publishing #13961
  • switch and underline #13950
  • Button, switch #13949
  • TableView blows up on iOS/Catalyst when using SceneDelegate #13948
    Backlog
  • Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR) on Opening Maps when running on Release mode on .net 8.0 Preview . #13947
  • [Android] ItemSpacing degrades scrolling performance of CollectionView #13946
    Backlog

Closed

  • Path does not update its layout when Data is modified #13802
    Backlog
  • This is definitely an issue #13967
  • .NET MAUI MVVM OneWay bindings issues #6571
    Backlog
  • CollectionView items layout is not changed when GridItemsLayout.Span is changed on iOS and Windows #10144
    Backlog
  • CollectionView with GridItemsLayout: Issues when changing Span #8387
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Windows] CollectionView ItemSpacing is not working #4112
    Backlog
  • Blazor UI Freezes on scroll #13722
  • [Windows] Clicking on the ellipse of a templated RadioButton doesn't work on WinUI #13895
  • [Android] Inner circle won't draw on templated RadioButton that started unselected. #13896
  • XamlC error XFC0000 : Cannot resolve type "ContentPage".    #13666
  • FileNotFoundException when loading resx file #13784
  • Image Source to null doesn't work if the Source had a different value before #8787

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ListProxy GC issues #13973
  • [net7.0] Cache the dynamic AppTheme value in Controls (and not Essentials) (#11200) #13963
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix memory leak in VisualElement.Shadow #13960
    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Windows] Fix Shadow positions issues #13959
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Enabling tolerance adjustment in iOS color verification tests #13945

Merged

  • [Windows] Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled on Windows SearchBar #13636
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix issue updating the Path Data #13816
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [C] Properly set SelectedItem and Index #13740
    area/Xaml </>, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 7.0.3 to 7.0.4 #13952
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #13137
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #13907
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Blank image when Source set to null or on image loading error #13614
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, backport/suggested
  • Fix for RadioButton.DefaultTemplate not drawing inner check glyph when selected on Android and WinUI #13899
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Add an error if Xamarin.Forms was found #13933
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Create development path without compatibility projects #13660
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Only fail aar task in CI or when set as target #13935
  • [net8.0] [vs-workload] Use variable to control VSMAN name #13888
    area/setup 🪄
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2.1 #13162
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
  • [Android] Fix Frame Renderer to use Wrapper View correctly #12218
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • We no longer need to reference BuildTools #13687
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [controls] fix memory leaks in `Page` & navigation #13833
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Implement ScrollView Orientation #13657
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #13908
    area/controls 🎮, keyboard
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [Essentials] Remove Task.Run from SecureStorage #13940
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13703
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️
  • Adjust flex item position to account for reversal when laying out unconstrained #13936
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix next keyboard into a ListView and TableView iOS #13838
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/ListView, control-entry
  • [Windows] Implement SearchBar CancelButtonColor on Windows #13622
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Invalidate shapes changing any property inside the brushes (Fill, Stroke) #13905
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix issue calculating the threshold using SwipeItemViews #13615
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Ensure an exact measure for the nested horizontal scrollview #13554
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Windows] Fix Picker alignment issues #13516
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • [Android] Fix controls RTL issues #13672
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Use darc to get feeds for dependencies of build #11487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Correctly propagate BindingContext to Border StrokeShape #13793
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Fix iOS ListView Footer Missing (#13560) #13744
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • Fix Android ListView header / footer gone (#12312) #13712
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
